::Scattershot/Prowl::

Scattershot rounds a corner. The insane bot had forgotten where his quarters 
were located, so he was wandering the base in search of them. His eyes widen 
as he sees an air vent cover replace itself.

"GHOSTS!!" he yells, grabbing DeathStorm's head off his own and running back 
the way he came in terror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl frowns as Dinobot bats aside his arm, then backing up in the vent so 
the other bot won't accidently crash into him. Prowl chuckles as he hears the 
yell from Scattershot.

"Let's just hope the idiot wouldn't bring the others to view these 'ghosts'. 
They're not all as dumb as he is."

Prowl crawls down the vent, stopping at the other side. He looks through the 
cover, some sort of shelf set obscuring his sight of the bots inside.

"Once we're in, we need to take out the rest of the bots. Do it silently, if 
they sound the alarm, we're dead," he says through his silencer.

"Ready?" Prowl waits for a responce from Dinobot, ready to open the vent and 
jump down into the torture chambers.
